god

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5406a0bc6368726098d00100#post_5406a0bc6368726098d00100
i don't really do much
i mean like
i play video games, i watch cartoons, and i watch movies

like i'm sure there are a lot of things i could do easily, given the proper training
but i don't trust myself to be able to do so

and like
i've tried thinking about any possible careers i could do
and i can't think of anything
i don't to be a doctor, or a soldier, or a chef, or a musician, or whatever have you

like
i enjoy video games and movies and such
but i don't think i'm creative enough to actually make anything in those fields

and what makes it all the more painful
i KNOW i'm just shitting on myself
half my brain is saying, no you can't do that, it won't work, just stop now
and the other half is pointing out my flaws, and telling me, what i should actually be doing, trying to motivate me
it is seriously insanely stressful
and all i'm doing is having a conversation with my own head
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a
